content.text:
# Sha (Queen Wei album)

Sha (傻) is the debut album released by Taiwanese singer and songwriter  Queen Wei (魏如昀).
Track listing
# 傻 (Silly)
# 蝶戀 (Butterfly's Love)
# 小彩虹 (Small Rainbow)
# 他們 (They)
# Luv Luv Luv
# Party Days
# 目光 (Vision)
# 親愛的 (Dear)
# 擁戴 (Support)
# 門沒關 (Door Not Closed)
